description: It is a template for the system. You must install it.

custom_tables.description: Manage the message text etc. when sending mail.

options.help: It is a key name to uniquely identify the mail template on the system.
It is a template name displayed on the list screen.
Please enter the display name of the sender.

Add the file you want to attach to the email.
Add the file column or documents you want to attach to the email.

custom_tables.description: Information to notify the user. It can be displayed on a dashboard etc.

options.help: If you want to display a list, please set to YES.
Display in the list in descending order of numerical value. (In the case of the same value, the update date and time are in the order of latest)
